text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason where concept is-a _ActIneligibilityReason

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActIneligibilityReasonActIneligibilityReasonIdentifies the reason or rational for why a person is not eligibile for benefits under an insurance policy.

    Examples are client deceased & adopted client has been given a new policy identifier.

name: ActIneligibilityReason
title: ActIneligibilityReason
description:
Identifies the reason or rational for why a person is not eligibile for benefits under an insurance policy.

Examples are client deceased & adopted client has been given a new policy identifier.
